name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.block.access.key.update.interval
description: Interval in minutes at which namenode updates its access keys.

name: seq.io.sort.mb
io.file.buffer.size
description:
The size of buffer for use in sequence files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: mapreduce.input.lineinputformat.linespermap
description:
When using NLineInputFormat, the number of lines of input data
  to include in each split.

name: dfs.balancer.getBlocks.size
description:
Total size in bytes of Datanode blocks to get when fetching a source's
    block list.

name: dfs.blockreport.split.threshold
description:
If the number of blocks on the DataNode is below this
    threshold then it will send block reports for all Storage Directories
    in a single message.

    If the number of blocks exceeds this threshold then the DataNode will
    send block reports for each Storage Directory in separate messages.

    Set to zero to always split.
